metadata.name: SHIELD #1/35
metadata.description: January Blizzard of 2022 in Toronto, Canada, while most would stay home from the storm, we go out in the snowstorm to document the story of mother nature. This blizzard shut down the city, created power outages  and gridlocks, and caused people to be stranded. I couldn’t go back to my place because the roads and transit lines were packed with snow. That day it snowed 55cm. It was forecasted to be around 30cm. Through the tough weather, I saw people going to their jobs to make their living. Got to respect the hustle and gotta do what you gotta do at the end of the day. Nature tells us a story with her weather. We try to adapt and be prepared to make it through the tough time. It goes to show that though there might be some rough days, but, eventually it gets better with time.
